description: Engi Threepieces is a dream demon like Merry, who however needs a vessel to access the real world. She wants to avenge her older sister, who was tricked in going to the real world and ended up being killed there. Engi thus asked Yui`s help to search for the dream demon Elcres, who she believes is responsible for Patti`s death. Although she can only physically appear during daydreams, she can possess Yui`s body in order to speak with others.
name: Engi Threepieces
